abstract: The breach could have occurred when users in Iran went to a Google site, like Gmail or Google Docs.
snippet: The breach could have occurred when users in Iran went to a Google site, like Gmail or Google Docs.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Hackers passed themselves off as the Internet giant Google with the apparent goal of snooping on people using Google services in Iran, the company said.

headline.main: In Latest Breach, Hackers Impersonate Google to Snoop on Users in Iran
headline.print_headline: In Latest Breach, Hackers Impersonate Google to Snoop on Users in Iran
